triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are positioned as core enabling technology for AI Agents, providing the foundation for task-specific automation.

triples.name: Generative artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Generative AI is characterized as a precursor providing the foundation that AI Agents advance beyond.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: Prompt engineering is identified as a key advancement mechanism enabling AI Agents to improve performance.

triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: RAG is proposed as a targeted solution to address hallucination challenges in AI systems.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: Autonomous agents are central to both AI Agents and Agentic AI paradigms, enabling coordinated autonomy and independent operation.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent collaboration is identified as a defining characteristic of Agentic AI systems.

triples.name: Hierarchical task network
triples.relevance: HTN planning relates to dynamic task decomposition, a key operational mechanism in Agentic AI systems.

triples.name: Customer support
triples.relevance: Customer support is presented as a primary application domain enabled by AI Agents.

triples.name: Scheduling (computing)
triples.relevance: Task scheduling is identified as a key application domain for AI Agents.

triples.name: Causal inference
triples.relevance: Causal modeling is proposed as a targeted solution to address brittleness and coordination failure challenges.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: Hallucination is examined as a unique challenge in AI paradigms with solutions proposed including RAG.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: Robotic coordination is identified as a key deployment domain for Agentic AI systems.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: Transformers are the foundational architecture underlying modern LLMs used in both AI Agent and Agentic AI systems.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the broader field that enables both AI Agents and Agentic AI through statistical algorithms and neural networks.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Artificial intelligence is the overarching field within which AI Agents and Agentic AI are positioned as specialized paradigms.
